questions.question: Which is not a storage class keyword in C?

#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
printf("%d\n", count(17243));
return 0;
}

int count(int n){
if(n==0) return 0;
return 1 + count(n/10);
}
What is the output for this question?

What is the use of format specifier in C language?

#include <stdio.h>
int main(void){
int a=5;
a = a+++a;
printf("%d\n", a);
return 0;
}
What is the value of a?
In C language, if a local variable is not initialized, what value does it hold?
What is a recursive function?
Why is an array called an internal pointer in C?
options: Because its indexing starts with zero
It holds the base address of memory block
Because it can increase/decrease its size dynamically
Because it contains same data type elements
questions.answer: It holds the base address of memory block

x = a - 3%2 + c*2/4%2 + b/4;
y = a = b + 5 - b + 9/3;
printf("%d %d\n", x,y);
return 0;
}

Which format specifier is generally used for printing addresses?

#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
int a=10;
int *p = &a;
printf("%d %d\n", p+1, *(p+1));
return 0;
}
(Assume p = 2456052) What is the output?

Which thread function is used to check pthread_id?
In C language, which function is used to generate a random number?

#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
int i,j;
for(j = i + 1, i = 1, i <= 5, j++, i++)
printf("%d %d\n", i, j);
return 0;
}
What is the output?
For accessing a member of a structure variable, which operator do we use?
What is the correct way to declare the main function?
Which is not a standard C library?

#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
char* ptr;
ptr = "My name is %s and age is %d\n";
printf(ptr,"Mayank" , 20);
return 0;
}
What is the output?
options: My name is Mayank and age is 20
My age is 20 and name is Mayank
questions.answer: My name is Mayank and age is 20
